      • sufferDamageOrMark

        public void sufferDamageOrMark(ColorPlayer colorPlayer,
                               int numDamage,
                               int numMark)
                        throws DamageTrackException
        Give damage token or mark token to the player
        Parameters:
        colorPlayer!= - null Color of the player who give damage
        numDamage>=0 - number of damage
        numMark>=0 - number of mark
        Throws:
        DamageTrackException - if player, who take damage, have 11 or 12 damage token
